subject: Baseball
Citizens Bank Park (Philadelphia, Pa)
lead_paragraph: Carlos Ruiz hit a leadoff home run in the 10th inning and the Philadelphia Phillies beat the St. Louis Cardinals, 2-1, Tuesday night after another fan ran onto the field at Citizens Bank Park.
snippet: Carlos Ruiz hit a leadoff home run in the 10th inning and the Philadelphia Phillies beat the St. Louis Cardinals, 2-1, Tuesday night after another fan ran onto the field at Citizens Bank Park.
